title: Mesudarim
overview: Four friends sell their start-up company for $217,000,000 and move in together into a mansion. The four stereotypical friends are: the serious CEO (Asaf Harel), the playboy marketing VP (Assi Cohen), the geeky chief programmer (Eran Zarahovitsh) and the junkie head designer (Maor Cohen). Now that money is not a problem, all the rest is...
